EmailTemplate.name: EmailTemplate-FrameworkAccessReviewReminder
EmailTemplate.Body:
#set($ctx = $spTools.class.forName("sailpoint.api.SailPointFactory").getMethod("getFactory", null).invoke(null,null).getCurrentContext()) #set($ruleObj = $ctx.getObjectByName($spTools.class.forName("sailpoint.object.Rule"), "Rule-Framework-Header-Footer-StyleSheet")) #set($ruleArgs = { "keyEmailTemplate" : "styleSheet" }) #set($styleSheet = $ctx.runRule($ruleObj, $ruleArgs)) #if( $ruleObj ) $ctx.decache($ruleObj) #end #set($ruleObj = $ctx.getObjectByName($spTools.class.forName("sailpoint.object.Rule"), "Rule-Framework-Header-Footer-StyleSheet")) #set($ruleArgs = { "keyEmailTemplate" : "headerTemplate" }) #set($headerTemplate = $ctx.runRule($ruleObj, $ruleArgs)) #if( $ruleObj ) $ctx.decache($ruleObj) #end #set($ruleObj = $ctx.getObjectByName($spTools.class.forName("sailpoint.object.Rule"), "Rule-Framework-Header-Footer-StyleSheet")) #set($ruleArgs = { "keyEmailTemplate" : "footerTemplate" }) #set($footerTemplate = $ctx.runRule($ruleObj, $ruleArgs)) #if( $ruleObj ) $ctx.decache($ruleObj) #end #set($currentYear = $spTools.formatDate($certification.getActivated(),"YYYY")) #set($dueDate = $spTools.formatDate($certification.getExpiration(),"MMMM dd, YYYY")) #if( $styleSheet ) $styleSheet #end #if( $headerTemplate ) $headerTemplate #end
#if ($workItem.getOwner().getDisplayName()) Dear $workItem.getOwner().getDisplayName(),
#elseif($workItem.getOwner().getFirstname()) Dear $workItem.getOwner().getFirstname(),
#else Dear $workItem.getOwner().getName(),
#end

The $currentYear Mover Access Review was scheduled to be completed on $dueDate

$certification.getCertificationName() - #set($c=$certification.getExpiration().getTime()) #set($t = $nowDate.getTime()) #set($d = $c - $t) #set($dd = ($d/(24*60*60*1000))+1) $dd days remaining for completion

#if( $footerTemplate ) $footerTemplate #end
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for reminding work item owners that their work items are overdue. NOTE: In addition to the declared arguments, all entries from the work item attributes map are also available by name in the template.

Argument.name: ownerName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that owns the work item.

Argument.name: requester
Argument.Description: The identity object that represents the creator of the work item.

Argument.name: ordinalNumReminders
Argument.Description: The number of this reminder, starting from 1. Passed as a String.

Argument.name: remindersRemaining
Argument.Description: The number of reminders remaining after this one. Passed as a String.

Argument.name: oldDueDate
Argument.Description: The former due date, passed as a java.util.Date.

Argument.name: newDueDate
Argument.Description: The new due date, passed as a java.util.Date.

Argument.name: nowDate
Argument.Description: The current date, passed as a java.util.Date.

Argument.name: created
Argument.Description: The date the work item was created, passed as a java.util.Date.

Argument.name: expiration
Argument.Description: The optional date the work item completely expires, passed as a java.util.Date.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Urgent Action Required Access Certification Reminder
